full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO RGYUD BLA MA'I BSTAN BCOS RNAM PAR BSHAD PA BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'PHAGS PA THOGS MED KYIS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @078A *, ,THEG MCHOG DAM CHOS RIN CHEN BSHAD 'DI LAS, ,BSAM YAS BSOD NAMS BDAG GIS GANG THOB PA, ,DES NI 'GRO KUN THEG MCHOG DAM PA'I CHOS, ,RIN CHEN DRI MA MED PA'I SNOD GYUR CIG ,'PHAGS PA MGON PO BYAMS PAS MDZAD PA, THEG PA CHEN PO RGYUD BLA MA'I BSTAN BCOS KYI RNAM PAR BSHAD PA SLOB DPON THOGS MED KYIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DPAL GRONG KHYER CHEN PO DPE MED KYI MKHAS PA CHEN PO BRAM ZE RIN CHEN RDO RJE'I DPON PO, ,PAndI TA MKHAS PA CHEN POS DA DZA NA DANG, LO RTZ'A BA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS, GRONG KHYER DPE MED DE NYID DU BSGYUR BA'O,, ,,BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'PHAGS PA THOGS MED KYI, ,RGYUD BLA'I RNAM BSHAD DPAR DU BZHENGS PA 'DIS, ,BLO GSAR RNAMS KYANG SHING RTA CHE RNAMS KYI, ,GZHUNG LUGS DGONGS DON RTOGS PA'I RKYEN BYED SHOG ,
